title: Zombienado
description: When a storm threatened during year two of the Final Plague, 17-year-old Emma rushed to the FoodMart for emergencies supplies for the other orphans sheâ€™d inherited. She anticipated zombies and she anticipated tornadoes. What she encountered was way more surprising. It'd been that kind of year.Zombienado is a 5500 word short story.
author: Lucas Berenson
